additional_info: For Sale - 10 Hectare Land with 2 Lakes , 20 km from Tbilisi! Land for New Business Development!!!! Land is surrounded by Mountains and river Iori. This Area can be used for new Tourism Development according to its location and environment. On this area can be built modern resort where Georgian citizens and all foreigners who come to visit Georgia can have relaxed and unforgettable holiday. Here you can suit 3 to 6 level Hotels, Restaurants, Bars, Sports Complex and also Fishing club. One of the Lake is around 3.4 hectares and 5 meter depth, which can be used for water sports and swimming. Lake is supplied by River Iori water, which is ecologically clean.
